Used to be enjoyable. I know this seems kinda odd, but as someone who played before it was free, and as someone who has played a lot of hours (3131), maybe it makes sense. Used to be you could play a single match without trolls and teamkillers. Used to be a community that loved trading and communicating with one another. Ive been gone since they made this free...and first game back? Teamkilled. The first thing they say, when i call out having p250 and smoke at the first round, is to tell me to shut the fuck up. So, of course, they were muted. I didnt tell them, didnt bother them, and yet they still killed me...I thought maybe there was a reason the numbers were lower and lower, and now I know its because now the game is rather.....toxic. Not the usual kind...just assholes.

Just testing to see if the game still has any of its old flair :D
Un juego competitivo, es bueno para pasar el rato es un shooter diferente a lo normal y es entretenido, recomendado

This game has a surprising amount of depth. Aside from the main competitive mode, you can practice your aim in deathmatch or 1v1, and you can practice your movement in climbing or surfing maps. If you put in the time, it can be a very rewarding experience.
